timeline.title: Certificate of Appreciation - BiztechCS
paragraphs: Appreciation Certificate for providing noteworthy contribution in the success of Biztech Consultancy durint the year 2018. Appreciated for efforts & dedication for Company.

image.title: TALAASH' 14
image.paragraph: 1st Rank in Web-Designing (Talaash-2014) held at Silver Oak Collage of Engineering & Technology.

timeline.title: 1st Rank in Web Designing - TALAASH' 14
paragraphs: Talaash '14 was a State Level Technical event organized by Silver Oak College of Engineering and Technology.

It was an Inter-College Technical festival where more than 5000 engineering students from different technical institutes of Gujarat participated and presented their technical skills. The whole event was organized to motivate students towards their technical expertise.

image.title: ICT for Make in India' 15

timeline.title: 2nd Rank in Web Designing - ICT for Make in India' 15
paragraphs: ICT for Make in India' 15 was a State Level Technical event organized by, School of Computer Studies - Ahmedabad University.
It was an Inter-College Technical festival where around 7000 students from different technical institutes of Gujarat participated and presented their technical skills.

image.title: AVISHKAR' 15
image.paragraph: 1st Rank in Web Designing (Avishkar-2015) held at NSIT (Narnarayan Shastri Institute of Technology).

timeline.title: 1st Rank in Web-Designing - AVISHKAR' 15
paragraphs: AVISHKAR '15 was a State Level Technical event organized by NSIT (Narnarayan Shastri Institute of Technology).

Narnarayan Shastri Institute Technology, Jetalpur is a premier institution of excellence Technical Education that develops professionals of high caliber imbued with values of entrepreneurship, ethics, and social responsibility.
It was an Inter-College Technical festival where students from different technical institutes of Gujarat participated and presented their technical skills.

It was an Inter-College Technical festival where students from different technical institutes of Gujarat participated and presented their technical skills.

paragraphs: Talaash '15 was a State Level Technical event organized by Silver Oak College of Engineering and Technology.

It was an Inter-College Technical festival where more than 5000 students from different technical institutes of Gujarat participated and presented their technical skills. The whole event was organized to motivate students towards their technical expertise.

timeline.title: Transcript Issuance System - Gujarat University
paragraphs: Our team made transcript issuance system for Gujarat University as a part of our 6th Semester Project. It enabled students to get verified transcript by university online (Previously a manual process).

image.title: TECH KAUSHALYA' 16
image.paragraph: 2rd Rank in Web-Designing (TECH KAUSHALYA-2015) held at Gujarat University.

timeline.title: 2nd Rank in Web Designing - TECH KAUSHALYA' 16
paragraphs: TECH KAUSHALYA '16 was a State Level Technical event organized by Department of Computer Science Rolllwala, Gujarat University.
TechKaushalya was a state level IT fest which aims to showcase and assess technical and nontechnical skills of the participants from renowned institutes of Gujarat.

timeline.title: LJ Internship Fair
paragraphs: Live project from our college which involved stakeholders from multiple departments. Our role was to create a supporting IT infrastructure for an event held in our college. We also made a website and an Android application that communicated with a RESTful API written in Laravel

timeline.title: Twitter Users Analysis
paragraphs: Twitter Users Analysis is a web application for analysing users of Twitter. Users are analysed by their daily activities like their Tweets, Hashtags used, User mentions, etc. All the analysis is displayed in graphical format, so it is easy to understand the analysis results.
timeline.technology: PHP, MySQL, Twitter API, D3JS, Plotly

timeline.title: My Daily News
paragraphs: My Daily News is a web application to check daily news. It provides news from 70+ different sources (BBC News, CNBC, Google News and many more). The purpose of this website is to provide news from different sources at one place, so user donâ€™t need to search for different places for different news.

timeline.title: 1st Rank in C Programming - <CODE-A-THON>
paragraphs: 1st Rank in Coding in C Programming(<CODE-A-THON> - 2017) held at LJ Institute of Computer Application, Organized by Japanese MNC - ACTY System.

timeline.title: Send My SMS - Bulk & Dynamic SMS System
paragraphs: Send My SMS is a web application for sending bulk/individual message to any number. It is developed for local stores and Institutes. Later on, additional features like contacts and dynamic message using .csv file is also added to the website. By using these features institutes can generate dynamic messages (Attendance, Exam results, etc.) using .csv file.
timeline.technology: PHP, MySQL, AngularJS, Text Local API

timeline.title: LJ Innovation Village
paragraphs: LJ Innovation Village was an event organized by LJ Institute. It was a platform to showcase innovative projects, products, start-ups by innovators. It provides an opportunity to innovators to interact with students, faculties, industry people and investors.

Our role was to create a supporting IT infrastructure for the event. We made a website in Angular for the event in which students can register and add their projects which is also evaluated by Professionals on the basis of different criteria. (Previously a manual process).

timeline.title: Laboratory Resources Perusal
paragraphs: Laboratory Resources Perusal is system developed for monitoring Laboratory Assets. It gives a dashboard of any PC connected to the same network.

System can be used by Laboratory Administrator to monitor user activity, CPU performance and CPU / Memory Usage. System logs & Reports are also generated and that can be used in further decision making.

image.title: World Map - Languages, Currencies & More - Humber College

timeline.title: World Map - Languages, Currencies & More - Humber College
paragraphs: It's a World map built with different API(s) to get all information including Currencies, Languages, Neighbour Countries, Timezones, Population, etc. at one place. And also allows user to translate text into any country's primary language.
timeline.technology: HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Restcountries API, Google Maps API, Google Translate API, Bootstrap

timeline.title: iTutor - Online Tutor - Humber College
paragraphs: This online tutor system assists locate tuition instructors from nearby locations. Teachers can also get a student just via logging onto the website and setting up the profile. In this system, there are three entities namely, Admin, Student, and Tutor. Admin can log in, control students, tutors & materials they share between one another. Tutors can add a schedule for appointments, share materials, and share learning materials to students. Students can book appointments, view learning materials given by tutors, give mock tests, etc. Online tutor system will be used by College, School or University students. They can register into the system. Students login into system, and appoint, schedule and pay tutors for particular subjects.
Demo Username: hetkansara.work@gmail.com
Password: Humber@123
timeline.technology: HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, MySQL, Composer

paragraphs: Solar system CSS Animation developed for final assignment of the Digital Desgin Class.
